subject: Track and Field
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Tennessee women set a world record in the rarely contested 4x1,500-meter relay at the Penn Relays in Philadelphia. The team of Chanelle Price, Phoebe Wright, Rolanda Bell and Sarah Bowman ran the winning time of 17 minutes 8.34 seconds, beating the record of 17:09.75 set by Australia in 2000.
